notifications.invalidServer_text: The server address you entered is not valid
notifications.unknownError_text: We could not perform the desired action this time. Please try again.

welcome1.title: WELCOME
welcome1.text1: Thank you for downloading the IOTA wallet.
welcome1.text2: We will spend the next few minutes setting up your wallet.
welcome1.reminder: You may be tempted to skip some steps, but we urge you to follow the complete process.

welcome2.title: WALLET SETUP
welcome2.text1: Okay. Lets set up your wallet!
welcome2.text2: Do you already have a seed that you would like to use?
welcome2.seed_explanation1: A seed is like a master password to your account.
welcome2.seed_explanation2: You can use it to access your funds from any wallet, on any device. But if you lose your seed, you also lose your IOTA
welcome2.button2: NO - I need a new seed

lightserver.title: LIGHT SERVER SETUP
lightserver.text1: A light server is a gateway to the IOTA network, kindly provided by members of the community or our corporate partners.
lightserver.text2: You can find out more information about the servers at: http://iotasupport.com/lightwallet.shtml
lightserver.text3: Please choose a server from the list below.

login.title: Login
login.error_text: The password was not recognised. Please try again.

enterSeed.title: ENTER YOUR SEED
enterSeed.error_text: Seeds must be at least 60 characters long. Please try again.
enterSeed.invalid_seed_text: Your seed is invalid. A seed may contain uppercase letters (A-Z) and the number 9 and must be 60-81 characters long.
enterSeed.seed_explanation: Seeds should be 81 characters long and should contain capital letters A-Z, or the number 9. You cannot use seeds longer than 81 characters.
enterSeed.reminder: NEVER SHARE YOUR SEED WITH ANYONE

newSeedSetup.title: GENERATE A NEW SEED
newSeedSetup.text1: Press individual letters to randomise them.

saveYourSeed.title: SAVE YOUR SEED
saveYourSeed.text1: You must save your seed with at least one of the options listed below.

saveYourSeed2.title: SAVE YOUR SEED
saveYourSeed2.explanation: Your seed is 81 characters read from left to right. Write down your seed and checksum and triple check they are correct.

saveYourSeed3.title: SAVE YOUR SEED
saveYourSeed3.explanation: Click the button below to copy your seed to a password manager. It will stay in your clipboard for 60 seconds.
saveYourSeed3.text: Do not store the seed in plain text.

saveYourSeed4.title: SAVE YOUR SEED
saveYourSeed4.explanation: Click the button below to print a paper copy of your seed.

securityIntro.title: SET UP LOCAL PASSPHRASE
securityIntro.text1: To make it easier to log into this wallet, you can now set up a shorter passphrase. This local passphrase can only be used on this device.
securityIntro.explanation1: The local passphrase can only be used to unlock the account on this device.
securityIntro.explanation2: The IOTA seed can still be used to access your funds on any wallet on any device.

setPassword.title: PASSWORD SETUP
setPassword.text: Okay, now we need to set up a password.
setPassword.explanation: An encrypted copy of your seed will be stored in your keychain. You will then only need to type in your password to access your wallet.
setPassword.reminder: Ensure you use a strong password.
setPassword.error1_text: Your password must be at least 12 characters. Please try again.
setPassword.error2_text: The passwords you have entered do not match. Please try again.
